name: Whole Wheat Sweet Potato Bread
author: Ali Roux
summary: This bread is refined sugar-free and can be made vegan if you use an egg substitute, like flax eggs.
ingredients: 1 ¾ cups sifted whole wheat flour
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Spray a 9x5-inch loaf pan with cooking spray
Place sweet potato on a microwave-safe plate and pierce skin 5 or 6 times
Cook in the microwave, rotating halfway through, until tender, 5 to 8 minutes
Cool until easily handled, about 5 minutes
Peel and mash in a small bowl
Mix whole wheat flour, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt together in a large bowl
Whisk applesauce, eggs, and maple syrup together in a separate bowl
Mix in 1 cup mashed sweet potato
Pour applesauce mixture over flour mixture; stir to combine
Pour into the prepared loaf pan
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 45 to 55 minutes
Cool in the pan for 15 minutes; invert onto a wire rack and let cool completely, about 20 minutes
